tool_description: Generates boilerplate code, components, screens, and API interfaces based on templates and specifications for cross-platform development.

generator_type.description: Type of code to generate (component, screen, api, model, service, test)

name.description: Name of the generated code element

template.description: Template to use for code generation

properties.description: Properties or parameters for the generated code

target_platform.description: Specific platform to target (ios, android, web)

include_tests.description: Whether to generate accompanying test files

style_framework.description: CSS/styling framework to use (native, styled_components, emotion, tailwind)

error_messages: Invalid generator type: Supported types are component, screen, api, model, service, test.
Template not found: The specified template does not exist for the generator type.
Invalid name format: Name must be a valid identifier (alphanumeric and underscores only).
Platform not supported: Target platform must be ios, android, web, or all.
Property format error: Properties must be in valid format (name:type pairs).
File already exists: A file with the same name already exists. Use force option to overwrite.
usage: Provide project_path, generator_type, and name. Optionally specify template, properties, target_platform, include_tests, and style_framework. The tool generates the requested code files.

files_generated.description: List of files that were generated

imports_added.description: Import statements that need to be added to other files

next_steps.description: Instructions for integrating the generated code

template_used.description: Name of the template that was used for generation
